scripts.build: astro check && astro build && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && bun build src/sw.ts --outfile=dist/sw.js --minify && bun build src/cs.ts --outfile=dist/cs.js --minify && bun build src/script.ts --outfile=dist/script.js --minify && bun build src/us.ts --outfile=dist/us.js --minify && rm -rf browse-llm.zip && zip -r browse-llm.zip dist/*
